channel.title: Auto restarter after null
channel.description:
i just made an UID on my server so cheat clients cant logg in and now i have a problem many of my old players on old client still try to logg inn not 1 time , no like 100 times... so after a while my server get nulled cuz of that
i need a restarter that restarts after a null :s once i saw there was a tut for it but cant find anymore :S so ppl plz help me
informtion : windows 7 delta 2specced 317

item.title: Auto restarter after null
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

i use roflmao456’s restarter,it works really well
You can set the amount of mintues you want
Also if it sends a message every 180 minutes,then search for that message in client.java.
Somewhere there ,there should be the number 180,

Read full topic

item.title: Auto restarter after null
item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345
item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

hm, give us a code… ?
i have a timer that says a message, but the problem it;s set to say it every 180… i need to know whats the number to put if i need a 1 hour restart?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto restarter after null
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

whenever my server nulls,i restart manually
I suggest setting the time for the restarted to fairly low,so it updates reguarly meaning there is low chance of null staying in your cmd.
just an idea

Read full topic

item.title: Auto restarter after null

item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

i am having the same problem too, a help is kindly appreciated.
